DOC.brief_title: Improving Smoking Cessation Quitlines : Pilot Study Acceptance Therapy
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 old ; 2. smoke least 10 cigarette daily do least past 12 month ; 3. want quit smoke next 30 day ; 4. willing randomly assign either group ; 5. willing able speak read English ; 6. willing medically eligible use nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) , 7. currently reside U.S. , expect continue least 12 month ; 8. participate smoke cessation intervention ; 9. regular access telephone . 10. regular access email address . The Exclusion criterion opposite Inclusion criterion list . In addition , follow exclusion criterion also apply : 1. another member household enrol study ; 2. currently use medication nicotine replacement product help quit smoking ; 3. currently use noncigarette tobacco product ; 4. pregnant breastfeeding ; 5. heart attack last 30 day ; 6. within last 6 month , diagnose angina , heart pain , irregular heartbeat ; 7. serious adverse reaction nicotine patch include anaphylaxis relate symptom hive , respiratory difficulty , and/or angioedema .
